name: Storytiming
description:
In this deceptively difficult puzzle platformer, you guide our little hero through several challenging stages. Plan out your moves ahead of time, see them play out while the narrator cheers you on and enjoy the delightful art style of Storytiming the game.

Controls:
The game takes your input before it moves. As such pressing e.g "A" will load your intention of going left, for the amount of time you pressed the key. Upon pressing the "return/enter" key, movement begins based upon your pending actions.

A -> Left,
D -> Right,
Space -> Jump,
Return -> Begin pending actions.

The challenge is to predict how much time you need to walk and when you need to jump to clear each level.

This game is brought to you by

Our team consists of:

Marie Discord: Marie C Brix#8613

(Cheat key: Press: Page Up to skip through levels - also useful to get back to the main menu).
